Definition:Â  MOHP
Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
is a monthly entitlement paid to Veterans or service members who were awarded the Medal of Honor for distinguished military service.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6 - Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section None
